name: DeckBird.ai WebShow Button
author: DeckBird.ai

sections.description:
DeckBird.ai turn Presentations into Sales Leads Generators: Video Decks, AI Voice and Video, Meeting Scheduling, Call-to-Action, CRM, and Stats Tracking. Embed in Email, Website, WhatsApp, Slack, and more!

WebShow is a floating button on your website that will show the presentation of your choosing with all the interactivities. This is a great way to showcase the presentation to your website viewers and turn them into sales leads.

This plugin allows you to add DeckBird.ai WebShow Button to your WordPress site. When visitors of your site click on the button, a presentation of your chosen will be shown.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later. You can find the full text of the license in the LICENSE file included with this plugin.
sections.faq:
What does the Plugin do?

The Plugin let you easily add DeckBird.ai WebShow Button to your WordPress site, without having to edit the site’s codes.

How do I use this plugin?

After activating the plugin, go to the settings page to configure the plugin options.

Where can I get support?

Please contact us at info@deckbird.ai.

What data are passed from DeckBird.ai to the Plugin?

The Plugin use IFrame to embed a presentation of your choice to your site. It is just like openning the presentation from a browser. There is no other information being passed to the Plugin.

For DeckBird.ai’s Privacy Policy and Term of Service, please visite the pages below:
https://www.deckbird.ai/privacy
https://www.deckbird.ai/terms-of-service
